name: Innocence (Puddimasta)
description:
CONTROLS:

A/D - Move left & right

SPACEBAR - Jump

Q/E - Switch elements

LEFT CLICK - Fire projectile

Character traits differ based on your selected element

Alov (Fire): Run faster at the cost of lower jump height. Shoot fireballs to light torches.

Dunia (Earth): Slower movement but greater jump height. Place small blocks you can use as a base for reaching higher platforms or activate pressure plates.

Hava (Air): Slightly slower but you can double jump. Shoot gusts of wind to activate fan platforms.

P - Reset

Please share your feedback and fill in this form: https://forms.gle/RMhoS4fLA9JBRM5w9
